question: Question_06_(a)
statement:
Consider the homogeneous system $\displaystyle A\vec{x} = 0$. Suppose
that the Echelon form of \emph{A} is given by

$\displaystyle A_{1} = \begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & -1 & 2 \\
0 & 0 & 0 & 0\\
0 & 0 & 0 & 0
\end{bmatrix}$

What is the rank of \emph{A}
sols:
The rank is the number of nonzero rows in the rref. We are given the
rref and can see that the rank is 1.
